DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy AGN-229666 prevention allergen-mediated conjunctivitis .
DOC.brief_title: AGN-229666 Ophthalmic Solution Japanese Patients With Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Japanese patient live Japan history allergic conjunctivitis . Presence active eye infection ( bacterial , viral , fungal ) History eye herpetic infection .
